original_title: The Stalker Chronicles: Episode Two - Reflections
overview: Cary is being followed, she does not see her stalker but he is there in every shadow and every reflection. Once she is home, feeling safe she goes to bed with her boyfriend but in the darkness hides a killer. Watching he waits for his desire to be fulfilled.
tagline: A killer stalks the night.  The reflection of death is what he craves and he has his next victim in sight.
title: The Stalker Chronicles: Episode Two - Reflections
